lines.text: The law requires a room for each child.
Where do they liv now - at the Ritz?
I may jump up and down if you put an alligator in the bathtub, but i will never ever hurt you for telling the truth!
So as far as you know your father really liked you boys?
I had a husband once, but he was worse than the kids. So I kept the kids and got rid of the husband!
Well - I'll be... Kiss a frog and look what happens!
You win! On the house! First prize for the fastest worker in town!
Better make it four bedrooms, Darling. I've got a feeling it's gonna be a girl.
Maybe we just oughta leave them alone?

Oh no you don't! You'll never be all one piece until they are back! Besides - you promised her. You promised me. You promised Melissa. and you back out now - I'll go up and down the street, knocking on doors, telling everybody that Elmer Jackson goes back on his promises!
